entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Globally configured InteractiveServer breaks RCL razor pages #53882
  • Allow deletion of Data Protection keys #53880
  • Logging scope opt-out #53879
  • ASPNET Core 8.0 Identity Facebook External Provider Integration does not work. "The oauth state was missing or invalid." #53878
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53877
  • Perf regression: json #53876
  • CookiePolicyMiddleware modifies CookieOptions, leading to bugs if it's reused #53875
  • Quickgrid with Virtualize=true not displaying the data. #53872
  • Blazor WASM "Debug Adapter" fail to handle breakpoints when a Web Worker is present #53871
  • Duplicate template ids warning in VS #53869
    9.0-preview2
  • Invalid Anti-Forgery Token on OIDC Response #53868
  • Invisible namespace for other projects under specific folder name #53867
  • Perf regression: updates #53865
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #53864
  • [Blazor] Navigating to a page will scroll to top before rendering new page #53863

Closed

  • Setting Application name using WebApplicationOptions causes FileNotFoundException #53791
  • Can't sent byte[] from the client to the SignalR hub #53824
  • How to publish on Azure .NET 8 Blazor Web App with Interactive Auto on CLI? #53329
  • blazor server firefox Uncaught (in promise) WebSocket is not in the OPEN state #53721
  • Dependency Injection is not working in Blazor Webassembly Layout Page #53808
  • Error: System.InvalidOperationException: Method calls cannot be formatted in InputNumber & InputTextArea #53834

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53874
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53862
    area-signalr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53850
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.17
  • [release/6.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53851
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • [release/8.0] Update Yarn.msbuild #53849
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Fix casing of ProblemDetails for RFC compliance #53792
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0.3
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53542
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.3

Updated

  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • [Blazor] Websocket compression API review feedback #53835
    area-blazor
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Prevent error boundaries from handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #53826
    area-blazor
  • Add unit test to confirm change token is disposed during #53827
    area-blazor
